description: Manage and visualize customer journeys and touchpoints across various channels.
Design and deploy surveys across Web, Mobile, Zalo, SMS, Email, QR, and POS systems to gather customer feedback.
Aggregate and analyze customer reviews from multiple platforms to extract key insights.
Listen to and analyze customer conversations across chat, call, and email channels.
A smart contact center where human agents collaborate seamlessly with AI agents to improve response efficiency.
A comprehensive system to manage customer service tickets and resolve issues efficiently.
Gain deep insights into customer experiences across touchpoints with topic and sentiment analysis.
Monitor and evaluate the performance of surveys, engagement campaigns, contact center activity, and tickets.
Manage customer data, build unified profiles, and segment audiences for better targeting.
Run automated and targeted engagement campaigns to connect with customers effectively.
Configure and manage AI models and automation workflows tailored to customer service operations.
